latestPosts.caption:
Say hello to your glow protector!​
Meet the all new NIVEA Soft Daily UV! ​🤩

Here’s why it is going to be your new fav skincare staple!!​

😌 Non-sticky 😌 aka no chip-chip​

😎 Gives 88% UV protection^ 😎 aka no sun damage​

💧 48h moisturisation 💧 aka super soft skin​

✨ Fresh glow ✨ aka your spotlight​!

Get yours now on @myntra LINK IN BIO ✨ 

^Based on a consumer perception study conducted by ACNielsen Amer, May 2024, after 14 days of use. Individual results may vary.

#NIVEAIndia #NewLaunch #LaunchAlert 
Moisturiser with UV Protection, Hydration

Check all your glow goals! ✅​

Get the fresh glow that keeps you protected too! We love NIVEA Soft Daily UV and your skin will too! 🤩​

Get yours now from @myntra 

​​​#Moisturiser #UVProtection #NIVEAIndia #Hydration

latestPosts.caption:
Delhi Times Fashion Week was a whole vibe this year ✨💃🏽

From bold runway moments to effortless street style, it was all about expressing yourself — and taking care of yourself too!

One of my fav pit stops? The NIVEA Soft Daily UV booth 💙
It wasn’t just about skincare, it was an experience — refreshing, fun, and full of feel-good moments.
We got to play around with textures, test the product, and soak in a quick skincare boost before heading back into the glam madness. Because even amidst all the fashion frenzy, soft, protected skin is always in style 🌞💧

Fashion and skincare — a combo I’ll always root for.
Were you there? Did you check out the booth too?

#DelhiTimesFashionWeek #NIVEASoft #SoftSideOfFashion #SkincareOnTheGo #DTFW2025 #GlowWithConfidence

They were lucky the whole booth couldn’t fit in my purse 🗣️
.
.
.
.
.
@niveaindia #ad #collab

I had an amazing time at the Delhi Times Fashion Event, and guess what? I spotted my favorite brand, @niveaindia , showcasing their latest launch — NIVEA Soft UV! 🫶🏻✨

I’m genuinely impressed with this new range. It’s non-sticky, super lightweight, and offers up to 88% UV protection — perfect for the summer!

Definitely my new go-to this season! 💙💙

.

.

.
